containers.name: api
args: python manage.py collectstatic --noinput && python -m gunicorn --workers=1 --bind=0.0.0.0:8080 --access-logfile - --log-file - --log-level=info project.wsgi

command:
if [[ -f /opt/bitnami/scripts/rabbitmq/nodeshutdown.sh ]]; then
    /opt/bitnami/scripts/rabbitmq/nodeshutdown.sh -t "120" -d "false"
else
    rabbitmqctl stop_app
fi
